Name: Dice & Dungeons
About the game: Dice & Dungeons is a unique deck builder. You build a DICE deck (dicebuilding)! Explore dungeons, fight enemies with increasingly difficult and get new dice to your deck. A dungeon and it's challenges are never the same as before. - Based on dice building board games - Several different dice to build your 'deck' - RPG elements - Character classes - Weapons and other items - Unique experience of building dice decks *This game is not easy. You need build a good deck of dice and have a good strategy to win
Meta Title: Dice & Dungeons: May 20, 2022, Beni Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Dice & Dungeons? Check out the release date (May 20, 2022), developer insights from Beni Games, and a complete game summary.
